name: Split (Non-GMTK Version)
description:
Split was created for the GMTK 2021 Jam, however due to build issues, it was unable to be submitted properly. 

Credit

While the game and the art were all hand-made by Second Last Studios, The music was not. As a result of this we would like to credit (and thank) spinningmerkaba for the amazing audio track 260809 Funky Nurykabe that we used in Split.
